name: Roc from the Valley of Haze

Rulings.Tengu:
●Because this effect is a mandatory Trigger Effect, you cannot miss the timing with it.
●So even if you send Roc from the Valley of Haze to the GY as a cost, or in the middle of a chain, it will still be shuffled into your Deck (after resolving the current series of events).
Rulings.Goat: ●Because this effect is a mandatory Trigger Effect, you cannot miss the timing with it. So even if you send Roc from the Valley of Haze to the GY as a cost, or in the middle of a chain, it will still return to your hand (after resolving the current series of events).
